thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: modern and clean, if a little noisy outiside
thread.title_full: modern and clean, if a little noisy outiside - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sam g
title: modern and clean, if a little noisy outiside
text:
Very nice and modern hotel just 1 block away from times square. Price is reasonable for New York. Elsewhere it's a $120-$150 per room per night here it is $250-$300. We came for a weekend and had 2 rooms reserved. Both were very clean.
Check in was very quick, staff was great. I was a little surprised that their restaurant was still closed for renovations, so we couldn't get breakfast. When I was booking about a month ago I was under impression it would be done but I guess delays happen.
The one thing I found surprising was that even on 9th floor with closed windows you still could here a lot of street noise. We've stayed in other hotels on and around Times Square before and I don't remember the noise. But that was a minor thing in otherwise great stay.
